title: All jokes aside when are we going to see an Illoai skin released?
body:
Hitting the 2 year mark and no illaoi love has been seen, i mean i understand that there is a great deal of difficulty in creating skins for champions that have multiple models but surely a illaoi skin has to be on the way

i suppose the reason im asking is why is it taking so long to create a skin for her, Yoirck just got a new skin and he too has multiple models to create, not to mention all of the varoius skins for champions that have been released post illaoi. Is it because she isnt as popular as other champions or are there other reasons that she hasnt seen any love, there is no shortage of fan proposed skins for her, just would like to see if she is going to recieve anything any time soon.

replies.body: They said on Ask Riot a little while ago that Illaoi and Cass and the rest of them would be getting skins soon so just be patient.
Give me Dragon Priest Illaoi or give me death.
I just want some Aurelion love!
There was a leak on reddit, about a dunkmaster skin coming soon, but that's after the next champ is released, no date given as far as i saw
